channel.title: GNU MCU Eclipse
channel.description: A family of Eclipse CDT extensions and tools for GNU ARM & RISC-V development

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse plug-ins v4.3.2-201801250917 released
item.description: Version 4.3.2-201801250917 is a maintenance release; the main addition is support for semihosting in the SiFive RISC-V project template.

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse OpenOCD v0.10.0-7-20180123 released
item.description: Version v0.10.0-7-20180123 is a maintenance release; the main change was to add semihosting support for RISC-V targets.

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse RISC-V Embedded GCC v7.2.0-2-20180111 released
item.description: Version v7.2.0-2-20180111 is a maintenance release of GNU MCU Eclipse RISC-V Embedded GCC; it updates to the latest RISC-V sources and the build process was improved, to support even older GNU/Linux machines and processors.

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse OpenOCD v0.10.0-6-20180112 released
item.description: Version v0.10.0-6-20180112 is a maintenance release; the main change was to update to the latest commits.

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse plug-ins v4.3.1-201801092051 released
item.description: Version 4.3.1-201801092051 is a new release; the main additions are: improved debugging via a detailed peripheral viewer, now also available for debugging RISC-V applications, and better integration with the xPack binary tools (RISC-V toolchain, OpenOCD).

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse Windows Build Tools v2.10-20180103 released
item.description: Version 2.10-20180103 is a maintenance release of the GNU MCU Eclipse Windows Build Tools.

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse plug-ins v4.2.1-201711101735 released
item.description: Version 4.2.1-201711101735 is a major release; thanks to a contribution from SiFive, the project was enhanced with a template plug-in to create projects for the SiFive boards.

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse OpenOCD v0.10.0-5-20171110 released
item.description: Version v0.10.0-5-20171110 is a maintenance release; the main change was to patch the RISC-V code to no longer print the 4096 CSRs.

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse RISC-V Embedded GCC v7.2.0-1-20171109 released
item.description: Version v7.2.0-1-20171109 is a new release of GNU MCU Eclipse RISC-V Embedded GCC; the main improvement is in GDB, which no longer returns the 4096 CSRs together with the general registers. In contrast to the riscv64-unknown-elf toolchain, this toolchain is clearly intended for bare-metal embedded applications; for this it was necessary to update to the latest newlib 2.5 release which uses ‘underscore’ syscall functions and to remove the mandatory use of libgloss.

item.title: GNU MCU Eclipse OpenOCD v0.10.0-4-20171004* released
item.description: Version v0.10.0-4-20171004-0812-dev is a maintenance release; the main change was to revert some of the RISC-V patches that caused problems for other targets.
